title.title: Frequently Asked Questions
title.subtitle: Explore our FAQ section to resolve your doubts quickly. Find detailed answers to the most common questions about platform use, features, support, and more. Start here and take advantage of all the resources we've prepared for you!

faq1.question: How can I invest in Tizor?
faq1.answer: To invest in Tizor, you need to register on our platform and link a compatible wallet with USDT (Tether). Then, you can transfer funds and select a staking plan that fits your investment goals. Once your funds are in staking, they will begin to generate income according to our annual return projections.

faq2.question: What is staking, and how does it work in Tizor?
faq2.answer: Staking is the process by which your funds are locked for a specific period, allowing you to earn returns. At Tizor, the funds designated for staking are managed in cryptocurrency futures markets and Bitcoin mining operations, which help maximize profitability. Once the staking period ends, you can withdraw both the invested capital and the generated returns.

faq3.question: What is the minimum period to keep my funds in staking?
faq3.answer: The minimum staking period in Tizor is three months. If you decide to withdraw your funds before this term, a penalty will apply, and you will receive only a percentage of the returns accumulated up to that point.

faq4.question: What is the referral program, and how does it work?
faq4.answer: Our referral program allows users to earn passive commissions by inviting others to invest in Tizor. When one of your referrals makes an investment, you receive a percentage of the invested amount, paid in USDT. This percentage applies only to your referrals' initial investment and not to future reinvestments.

faq5.question: What happens if Tizor updates the Terms and Conditions?
faq5.answer: Tizor reserves the right to modify the Terms and Conditions at any time to adapt to new regulations or market changes. If updates are made, you will be notified promptly, and the changes will take effect immediately. We recommend periodically reviewing the Terms and Conditions to stay informed of any changes.

title.title: Tutorials
title.subtitle: Learn how to navigate and use each platform tool with our detailed tutorials and guides. From basics to advanced features, these resources will show you step-by-step how to optimize your experience, manage your activities, and make the most of each feature to achieve your goals.

terms-conditions.title: Terms & Conditions
terms-conditions.paragraph1: Tizor Bank (hereinafter, Tizor) is a decentralized platform that allows users to store their funds in USDT (Tether) through blockchain networks. Tizor offers staking services to generate income on these funds, with effective annual returns of up to
terms-conditions.paragraph2: Effective Annual. Additionally, it has a referral program that allows users to earn passive commissions of
terms-conditions.paragraph3: on their referrals' investments, provided that the referrals retain the investment within the Tizor platform ecosystem.

obj1.title: Investment and Fund Management
obj1.paragraph1: The funds invested in Tizor are managed in decentralized cryptocurrency futures markets, specifically in BTC (Bitcoin), operated by experts with strict risk management. Additionally, a portion of the funds is allocated to Bitcoin mining operations in our facilities, using high-tech ASIC Whatsminer equipment to maximize efficiency.
obj1.paragraph2: Funds placed in staking must remain in this state for a defined period to ensure adequate profitability. If the user decides to withdraw their funds before the three-month period, a penalty will apply, meaning they will only receive
obj1.paragraph3: of the profits generated up to the time of disbursement. The expected profitability is based on our market projections and is not guaranteed, as it depends on the volatility and risks associated with investments in the cryptocurrency futures market.

obj2.title: Referral Commissions
obj2.paragraph1: Tizor offers a referral program through which a user can earn
obj2.paragraph2: of the total investment made by the referred client. Payments will be made in USDT and can be withdrawn according to Tizor's internal policies. Referral commissions are calculated based on the initial investment of the referred client and do not apply to future reinvestments.

obj3.title: Risks and Limitations
obj3.paragraph1: Tizor implements rigorous risk management strategies to mitigate possible losses; however, due to the volatile nature of the futures markets and the cryptocurrency ecosystem, the user acknowledges and accepts the inherent risks of this type of investment.
obj3.paragraph2: Users understand that Tizor is not a traditional banking entity, and its investment and income generation model relies on highly volatile and high-risk decentralized markets.

obj4.title: Acceptance of Terms
obj4.paragraph1: By using Tizor services, users accept that their funds are managed in decentralized cryptocurrency futures markets and in Bitcoin mining activities using the company's ASIC equipment.

obj5.title: Decentralization and Financial Freedom
obj5.paragraph1: The creators of Tizor are a group of investors who share the vision of financial freedom and the decentralization of money, providing users with financial options outside the control of traditional banking systems.

obj6.title: Modifications to Terms and Conditions
obj6.paragraph1: Tizor reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Updates will be notified to users and will take effect immediately.
obj6.paragraph2: Tizor does not guarantee fixed profits and is not responsible for losses resulting from market fluctuations or other external factors.
obj6.paragraph3: These terms may be adjusted to include additional clauses or more details based on Tizor’s regulatory framework and operational structure.

obj7.title: Privacy and Data Protection Policy
obj7.paragraph1: Tizor ensures the privacy and security of its users' personal data. The information collected is used solely to enhance the platform experience and comply with legal requirements.
obj7.paragraph2: The data is protected by encryption and is not shared with third parties without consent, except for legal or regulatory demands.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.description: By accessing and using Tizor services, the user acknowledges and agrees to the Terms and Conditions described herein. The services offered by Tizor do not constitute financial advice and do not guarantee fixed returns. Tizor will not be liable for any loss resulting from fluctuations in cryptocurrency markets or investment decisions. The user assumes the inherent risks of using the services and understands that investments in cryptocurrencies are subject to high volatility. Users are advised to carefully assess their investments and, if necessary, consult an independent financial advisor.

meta.description: Tizor transforms the way you think about your finances; an innovative fintech that offers the opportunity to grow your money with superior daily returns. Through our investment platform, you can invest securely and hassle-free, watching your savings generate constant returns day after day.
meta.information: Security is our priority. To ensure you always have full control over your funds and avoid any inconveniences, it's essential to keep your user data updated. Maintaining your information is key to us managing your capital efficiently and without risks.

updateInfo.title: Update Information
updateInfo.description: Tizor is not responsible for losses or inconveniences if the user does not keep their address updated or loses access to their digital wallet. It is essential to have up-to-date data to ensure the security of investments and continuous access to funds.

message.success: Updated! You have successfully changed your virtual wallet.
message.information: Keep your data updated to avoid transaction losses.

description.txt1: The user has the option to cancel their investment at any time, which will trigger the refund of the initially invested funds. Additionally, an extra compensation will be provided, calculated based on the interest generated up to the cancellation date. This process offers a straightforward way to recover your investment.
description.txt2: It is important to note that the cancellation of the investment is irreversible and is executed immediately. Once the transaction is requested, it cannot be reversed or modified. Therefore, it is recommended to carefully consider your decision before proceeding with the cancellation.

unlock.information: The removal of the investment is irreversible, a penalty will be applied to the accumulated capital, the initial investment will be refunded along with an additional compensation calculated based on the interest generated up to the removal date. Please review the conditions carefully before proceeding.

message.success: Congratulations! You have successfully created a new investment.
message.information: The generated balance will be transferred to your account at the end of the investment period.

shared.description: Invite others to join and start generating passive daily earnings. Each new user who registers with your link and makes an investment will automatically generate interest. Your friends will enjoy the benefits of investing, and you will see your earnings grow each day. Share the opportunity to create wealth and maximize your income in our investor community.
shared.information: Send your invitation link and start generating earnings by inviting others to invest; you will earn daily interest from their investments. It's easy and quick!
